title: George Washington Memorial Parkway: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       Each of these activities helps you have fun and learn about the park:           Become a Junior Ranger Junior Rangers explore, learn about, and protect national parks. You can earn your own Junior Ranger badge by completing a Junior Ranger book.           Come to a Kid-friendly Event Join a ranger for fun, hands-on programs and events designed especially for kids and families.           Become a Webranger Are you and your family planning a trip to other National Parks? Do you want to explore more of your National Parks online? Become a WebRanger.      Please visit the Arlington House, Clara Barton National Historic Site, Glen Echo Park, Great Falls Park, and Theodore Roosevelt Island webpages for information about activities for kids at those sites.
